description: Profound humiliation causing visible distress and urge to disappear
actor_description: I feel exposed. My mind scrambles for a way to rewind time, and there isn't one. A laugh tries to happen and comes out wrong—thin, defensive, broken. My skin feels too tight, like I can't fit inside myself.
description_text: {actor} looks stricken—posture collapsing inward, face tense with the urge to disappear.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a brittle sound—half laugh, half choke—followed by silence.
